title: LOL patcher stuck at 80%
body: So, I got this new laptop, and I decided to get League again. The patcher got stuck on 80% its currently on step 2.  I have dealt with this before but it was at 33% and I'm not sure that way would work. Someone, please help. I just want to play League man.

replies.body: During this period, the patcher is trying to download new files but your network is somehow being blocked or unable to establish a connection to our patcher servers.  My recommendation would be to review our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide, and go over the steps provided to get this fixed up.  If you continue to have an issue afterwards, though, hit me up and we can dig deeper.
Yes, I have fixed this. But the thing is that it always happens during every patch. I find going to the file area RADS and lol_game_client and deleting filearchives helps this problem.
